review: how have i never played this  instant classic 3

as you would expect from a game that is a quarter century old the longest journey has some design choices that may annoy a modern audience but if you give this a try you probably are expecting that already   if anything you probably will be surprised by how much it still holds up the story is good and while the writing is not always on point it never took me out of it
great game  had no issues running on windows 11
magical
a wonderful story for an older game it still hits ive enjoyed playing this dozens of times over the years highly recommend playing all 3 games in this series
i enjoyed the game somewhat as a point and click game i would not recommend this game as it does take getting used to to some of the obscure puzzle solutions

genuinely a fantastic journey with a great variety of locations and characters strong worldbuilding and a decent helping of humor as well a few of the puzzles especially in the early part of the game may stray a bit into moon logic territory but its really not that bad overall especially by the standards of when this game came out  the ending is interesting its probably not quite what youre expecting when you get there

great game interesting story the universe is pretty detailed and great characters and a lot of funny moments that intertwine with some sad stuff just like our lives i think the most major flaws are  outdated graphics  a couple of riddles with weird solutions ive used a walkthrough so i didnt spend much time on them  initially i had a problem with starting the game on a newer video card but using dgvoodoo helped
masterpiece
if you like old school click and point adventure games this one is among the best its really good

one of my favorite point and clicks as an adult i grew up on sierra gamesso this may have a lot of moon logic im not sure but i love it the characters the backstory the humor and the coziness make it rank high for me

fantastic characters and story as well as fairly decent graphics for its age the biggest drawback is the amount of moon logic required for half of the puzzles which makes a first playthrough difficult without a guide to refer to i had to play an entire segment twice because i missed an item i couldnt progress without still if youre a fan of science fiction and fantasy stories the longest journey offers a wonderful balance between the two genres
yes

great adventure game cool story with unexpected twists big variety of puzzles and priceless humor played it in 2025 the first time ever and have absolutely no regrets truly a masterpiece and yeah its quite long especially when you try to play on your own without hints so visiting a community hub here for answers might help a lot the only bug i faced was constant white confirmation message on saveloadexit just press y on your keyboard to confirm or n to cancel
best game ever  its a wonderful story filled with imagination its a world i happily return too
very artful game reminds me of playing ispy when i was younger also elements of society and work mentality are built throughout the games enviroment you experience a lot in this journey

im surprised at how much negativity this game has in its reviews i have always found this game to be a delightful mix of tropey scifi and tropey fantasy right up there with grim fandango for me as far as adventure games go there is a graphical overhaul you can apply that looks really nice and doesnt get in the way of the original art style i used it in my last playthrough and thought it was quite good for what its worth
its great

game was super fun and really loved the atmosphere  what i didnt love was the lack of effort made to make this playable on a modern system i had to go through hours of trouble shooting and eventually had to use a vm to get the thing to run correctly   other than the technical hassle to get the game working i loved it i even purchased the sequel the only reason im not recommending it is because it was a frustrating experience and i almost didnt get to experience the amazing game

the game is a masterpiece in my opinion it combines all the elements of the old adventure games the story is wonderful and engaging the characters are likable the dialogues are funny and cheeky the whole experience is fun and nostalgic the only downside is that the game graphics are bad because the game is old  but there is a mod that you can download and play the game in hd steam should have included it in the game directly but whatever

enjoyed this enough to jump straight into dreamfall afterward its just a very solid story with likable characters and excellent environments one of those games that is more than the sum of its parts there is something special about the combination of elements here impressed with how much of the world they conveyed with just static environments probably the closest thing well get to a the sandman game

i love this game and its puzzles it really targets your problem solving i played it for the first time when i was about 10 and got stuck hopefully the adult me is a bit smarter and i will make it through to the end despite it being a really old game the art is extraordinary just use your imagination to eliminate dated graphic   1010 on plot and soundtrack

it breaks my heart to say that i dont recommend this game because it isnt the games fault the game is amazing i played it back when it came out ages ago its an incredible game and one of the greatest sagas with unforgettable characters the problem is that this particular offering on steam crashes all the time and its frustrating and hard to play unless you have a ton of time and patience to keep restarting and trying again etc

its one of the classics and holds up even after all this time however it is showing its age on steam since if you try to save over an existing game it crashes and every time you quit the game it crashes ctl alt del has become my friend sigh but i keep playing it its like visiting an old friend

played this for the first time in 2023 game was published in 2000 a nostalgic pointandclick with an interesting premise game takes about 20hrs including afk time so if youre looking for a little gamestory getaway and dont mind old graphics this is a sure bet double clicking and esc in dialogue is your friend by the way

i first played this when it was released im so glad to be able to play it again on todays machines the graphics havent aged well obviously however the voice acting and the story makes you forget about the 20 year old graphics this is the kind of game they dont make anymore a long and engrossing adventure  you just want to find out what happens next   if you dont want all the answers but need some guidance to get through the game then i recommend the universal hint system website
